comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: The aircraft he is seated in is either a French Nieuport 24 or 27 and would've been taken overseas in France at one of the Training Schools for pilots there. The aircraft has a gun mount for a Lewis gun to fire over the top wing, but none is fitted. The flying school would most likely have been at Tours or Romorantin, France. The photo would've been taken in the late 1917 thru late 1918 period.
